text: Uye zvirokwazvo, takapa Musa, Gwaro tikava tinotevedza mushure make nevatumwa. Uye takapa Isa (Jesu) mwana waMariya zviratidzo zviri pachena uye tikamusimbaradza nemweya mutsvene (Jibreel (Gabriel)). Ndizvo here kuti pose panouya mutumwa kwamuri nezvisingafarirwi nemoyo yenyu munozvitutumadza? Vamwe hamutendi mavari uye vamwe munouraya
